short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows LeadShark to connect to LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LeadShark Connect: Easily Connect your LinkedIn to LeadShark ü¶à

‚ú≥Ô∏è How to Use LeadShark Connect

1. Install the Extension
2. Login to LeadShark
3. Login to LinkedIn on another tab
4. Go to LeadShark Settings page
5. Click on Connect to LinkedIn

üîí Privacy is our Priority

LeadShark Connect prioritizes your data security. It accesses only the necessary LinkedIn cookies and transfers the cookies data securely to the LeadShark dashboard. Your information is encrypted and never shared with third parties. Your passwords or other sensitive login information is never acquired or stored anywhere.

---

For more information, visit https://leadshark.io or contact our support team at info@leadshark.io.
